data.text: My son, listen carefully to some more wise things that I will tell you.
If you do that, you will be able to choose wisely what to do,
What an immoral woman says to you may be as sweet as honey,
but the result of being with her will be bitter like gall
If you go where she goes [MTY], you will go down to where the dead people are.
She is not concerned about the roads that lead to a long life.
So now, my sons, listen to me.
Run away from immoral women!
If you enter the home of one of them, you will lose your ◄self-respect/good reputation►
Foreigners will take your money,
And when you are about to die,
Then you will say, “I hated it when people tried to correct me.
I did not heed what my teachers said!
Now I am almost ruined,
Like a man is refreshed by drinking water from his own well [MET],
Like you would not waste good water by pouring it into the street,
Enjoy having sex only with your wife;
Let your wife be a source of great pleasure to you.
She is as pretty and graceful as a young female deer.
My son, do not be [RHQ] captivated/charmed by an immoral woman!
I say that because Yahweh sees clearly everything that we do;
Evil men’s sinful desires hold them fast;
Evil men will die because they are unable to say “No” to their desires;
